description: Their Men’s Active Lined 8" Short offers a host of comfort elements mixed with practical ones. The athletic body-skimming fit enhances the body in motion, and the Merino Sport Brief liner provides support, dries quickly, and helps regulate temperature. Plus, this short is designed with lightweight stretch-woven fabric for ease of movement, as well as drop-in side pockets, a zippered back pocket, and reflective elements for when it’s dim. All of which makes these shorts perfect for a day on the beach, a workout in the gym, or a hike on your favorite trail.
name: Smartwool Active Lined Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
